author: missirol
body:
backport of #40928

#### PR description:

This PR is a possible solution to #40904. It adjusts some of the HLT-DQM unit tests to use unique names for their output files.

#### PR validation:

None beyond the checks done for #40928.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

#40928

Fix to HLT-DQM unit tests
title: use unique names for outputs of HLT-DQM unit tests [`13_0_X`]
